summary: Additional Perk Ability in Block Perk tree called Shield Ward...
descriptionHtml:
*WHAT IS THIS MOD*
New Ability in Block tree perk called Shield Ward that can cast while blocking using shields that can protect you against magic and shouts...

*WHY DID YOU MADE THIS MOD?*
HMM.. last night while watching on YouTube... i accidentally watched the trailer of SKYRIM V... i saw Dowahkiin block the Dragons Fire Breath... so i think this mod will be cool...

*INSTALLATION*
Download using NMM and activate...
or Download manually then copy the ESP file on Data Folder..

*UPDATE*
0.05 = old version (0.01), the ward can cast even in 1H (only) and even 2H weapons while            blocking.. now in this new version (0.05), only shields can cast ward...

*MY OTHER MOD*
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31719/

I hope it Works..
author: ISAAC93
